One cluster's ADMM for a fixed step size (rho).

admm_oneclust.Rd

One cluster's ADMM for a fixed step size (rho).

Usage

admm_oneclust(
  iclust = 1,
  niter,
  y,
  Dl,
  tDl,
  Dlp1,
  l = NULL,
  TT,
  N,
  dimdat,
  maxdev,
  rho,
  rhoinit = rho,
  Xinv,
  schurA,
  schurB,
  sigmainv,
  lambda,
  resp,
  resp_sum,
  ylist,
  err_rel = 0.001,
  err_abs = 0,
  zerothresh,
  mu,
  z,
  w,
  uw,
  uz,
  first_iter,
  em_iter,
  outer_iter,
  local_adapt,
  sigma,
  sigma_eig_by_clust
)

Arguments

iclust
niter
y
Dl
tDl
Dlp1
l

Default: NULL

TT
N
dimdat
maxdev
rho
rhoinit

Default: rho

Xinv
schurA
schurB
sigmainv
lambda
resp
resp_sum
ylist
err_rel

Default: 1e-3

err_abs

Default: 0

zerothresh
mu
z
w
uw
uz
first_iter
em_iter
outer_iter
local_adapt
sigma
sigma_eig_by_clust

Value

A list containing the updated parameters for the cluster.

See also

la_admm_oneclust which is a wrapper over this function.
